languages.text: "Думаешь, мне нравится это? Видеть мерзость за мерзостью, слышать оправдание за оправданием? Я ненавижу это и презираю всякого грешника. Будь я слаба — я бы выжгла эту скверную станцию ядерным огнем. Но я дарую каждому право на суд Его именем и шанс вернуться в лоно Его обновленным".

"Do you think that I find enjoyment in this? Looking at vileness upon vileness, listening to one excuse after another? I loathe this and despise every malefactor out there. If I were weak of will, I would have obliterated this foul station with nuclear fire. Instead, I am here to offer each of them the right to be judged in His name and the chance to return to His fold renewed."
languages.original_text: "Думаешь, мне нравится это? Видеть мерзость за мерзостью, слышать оправдание за оправданием? Я ненавижу это и презираю всякого грешника. Будь я слаба — я бы выжгла эту скверную станцию ядерным огнем. Но я дарую каждому право на суд Его именем и шанс вернуться в лоно Его обновленным".

If I were weak of will, I would have obliterated this foul station with nuclear fire. Instead, I am here to offer each of them the right to be judged in His name."

Instead, I am here to offer each of them the right to be judged in His name and the chance to return to His fold renewed."

languages.text: “你以为我喜欢这样吗？看着一个又一个卑鄙之人，听着一个又一个借口，你以为我喜欢吗？我厌恶这一切，我鄙视外面的每个渣滓。如果我的意志不够坚定，我早就用核热的烈焰摧毁这座邪恶的星站了。可我没这么做，而是以神皇之名，为每个人提供接受审判的权利，让他们有机会再次回到神皇的怀抱。”
languages.original_text: "Do you think that I find enjoyment in this? Looking at vileness upon vileness, listening to one excuse after another? I loathe this and despise every malefactor out there. If I were weak of will, I would have obliterated this foul station with nuclear fire. Instead, I am here to offer each of them the right to be judged in His name and the chance to return to His fold renewed."

traits.locale_text: “你以为我喜欢这样吗？看着一个又一个卑鄙之人，听着一个又一个借口，你以为我喜欢吗？我厌恶这一切，我鄙视外面的每个渣滓。如果我的意志不够坚定，我早就用核热的烈焰摧毁这座邪恶的星站了。可我没这么做，而是以神皇之名，为每个人提供接受审判的权利，让他们有机会再次回到神皇的怀抱。”

languages.text: 「私が楽しんでいるとでも？次から次へと、不浄なるものが立ち現れては言い訳を聞かされて。心から嫌気がするし、この世の悪人全員を軽蔑している。もし私の意思が少しでも弱ければ、この腐ったステーションを核の炎で燃やしていたところだろう。しかし、私は全員に、主の名前の元で裁かれる権利と、主のもとに戻るチャンスを提供するためにここにいるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Do you think that I find enjoyment in this? Looking at vileness upon vileness, listening to one excuse after another? I loathe this and despise every malefactor out there. If I were weak of will, I would have obliterated this foul station with nuclear fire. Instead, I am here to offer each of them the right to be judged in His name and the chance to return to His fold renewed."

traits.locale_text: 「私が楽しんでいるとでも？次から次へと、不浄なるものが立ち現れては言い訳を聞かされて。心から嫌気がするし、この世の悪人全員を軽蔑している。もし私の意思が少しでも弱ければ、この腐ったステーションを核の炎で燃やしていたところだろう。しかし、私は全員に、主の名前の元で裁かれる権利と、主のもとに戻るチャンスを提供するためにここにいるのだ」

languages.text: «¿Cree que me divierte esto? ¿Contemplar atrocidad tras atrocidad, escuchando una excusa tras otra? Lo detesto y desprecio a todos y cada uno de los malhechores. Si fuera débil de voluntad, habría arrasado esta asquerosa estación con fuego. En vez de eso, estoy aquí para ofrecerles el derecho a ser juzgados en nombre del Emperador y volver renovados a su redil».
languages.original_text: "Do you think that I find enjoyment in this? Looking at vileness upon vileness, listening to one excuse after another? I loathe this and despise every malefactor out there. If I were weak of will, I would have obliterated this foul station with nuclear fire. Instead, I am here to offer each of them the right to be judged in His name and the chance to return to His fold renewed."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cree que me divierte esto? ¿Contemplar atrocidad tras atrocidad, escuchando una excusa tras otra? Lo detesto y desprecio a todos y cada uno de los malhechores. Si fuera débil de voluntad, habría arrasado esta asquerosa estación con fuego. En vez de eso, estoy aquí para ofrecerles el derecho a ser juzgados en nombre del Emperador y volver renovados a su redil».

languages.text: "Glaubt Ihr, mir bereitet das Freude? Eine Widerwärtigkeit nach der anderen zu sehen und mir Ausrede um Ausrede anzuhören? Ich verabscheue es, und ich verabscheue jeden einzelnen Missetäter. Wäre mein Wille schwach, hätte ich diese schändliche Station durch nukleares Feuer ausgelöscht. Stattdessen bin ich hier, um jedem von ihnen das Recht zu gewähren, in Seinem Namen gerichtet zu werden und wieder in Seinen Schoß zurückzukehren."
languages.original_text: "Do you think that I find enjoyment in this? Looking at vileness upon vileness, listening to one excuse after another? I loathe this and despise every malefactor out there. If I were weak of will, I would have obliterated this foul station with nuclear fire. Instead, I am here to offer each of them the right to be judged in His name and the chance to return to His fold renewed."

traits.locale_text: "Glaubt Ihr, mir bereitet das Freude? Einen widerwärtigen Wurm nach dem anderen zu begutachten, mir eine Ausrede nach der anderen anzuhören? Ich verabscheue es, und ich verabscheue jeden einzelnen Missetäter. Hätte ich einen schwachen Willen, so hätte ich diese schändliche Station durch nukleares Feuer ausgelöscht. Stattdessen bin ich hier, um jedem von ihnen das Recht anzubieten, dass im Namen des Imperators über ihn geurteilt wird."

languages.text: « Parce que vous croyez que je prends plaisir à regarder ces scélérats défiler devant moi en essayant de me faire avaler leurs misérables excuses ? C'est une tâche que j'exècre tout autant que chacun de ces malfaiteurs. Si j'étais faible, j'aurais lancé une bombe nucléaire sur cette infâme station. Au lieu de cela, je prends mon mal en patience pour permettre à chacun d'eux d'être jugé en Son nom et de revenir dans Son giron. »
languages.original_text: "Do you think that I find enjoyment in this? Looking at vileness upon vileness, listening to one excuse after another? I loathe this and despise every malefactor out there. If I were weak of will, I would have obliterated this foul station with nuclear fire. Instead, I am here to offer each of them the right to be judged in His name and the chance to return to His fold renewed."

traits.locale_text: « Parce que vous croyez que je prends plaisir à regarder ces scélérats défiler devant moi en essayant de me faire avaler leurs misérables excuses ? C'est une tâche que j'exècre tout autant que chacun de ces malfaiteurs. Si j'étais faible, j'aurais lancé une bombe nucléaire sur cette infâme station. Au lieu de cela, je prends mon mal en patience pour permettre à chacun d'eux d'être jugé en Son nom et de revenir dans Son giron. »

languages.text: "Bu işten keyif aldığımı mı sanıyorsun? Rezalet üstüne rezalet görmek, bahane üstüne bahane duymak hoş mu sence? Bunlardan da suçlulardan da iğreniyorum. İradem zayıf olsa bu rezil istasyonu nükleer alevlere boğardım. Ama hepsine O'nun huzurunda yargılanıp yeni benlikleriyle yine O'nun huzuruna dönme hakkını sunmaya geldim."
languages.original_text: "Do you think that I find enjoyment in this? Looking at vileness upon vileness, listening to one excuse after another? I loathe this and despise every malefactor out there. If I were weak of will, I would have obliterated this foul station with nuclear fire. Instead, I am here to offer each of them the right to be judged in His name and the chance to return to His fold renewed."
